basics.name: Han Helen Zhang
basics.intro: I know how to build a robot from just a concept, to a real machine, and then eventually turn it into a commercial product.

experience.name: Jaresh Tech Inc.
highlights: A startup company focused on next-generation XR glasses.
Lead the Engineering Verification Test (EVT) and Design Verification Test (DVT) of the product prototype.
Develop the circuits, mechanical structures, CV and SLAM algorithms.

experience.name: Dexta Robotics Inc.
highlights: A startup company specializing in easy-to-use force feedback glove.
Raise over $1.5M angel round from Grainsvalley Ventures and Sunwoda(A Public company).
Design the circuits, embedded systems, C# API, and Unity applications.
